edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.IF.expr

Interface OffsetReference

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NTReferenceExpression, ReferenceExpression, SymbolicExpression, SymbolicObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonOffsetReference

    public interface OffsetReference
extends NTReferenceExpression
    A reference to some point which is specified by an integer "offset" from another reference.
